meanings.definition: A bone cell that helps maintain the structure of bone tissue.
meanings.sent1: Osteocytes are tiny bone cells that keep our bones strong.
meanings.sent2: The osteocytes in our bones play a crucial role in maintaining bone structure.
meanings.sent3: The osteocytes had a meeting to discuss bone maintenance strategies.
meanings.sent4: Like diligent architects, osteocytes ensure the structural integrity of our bones.
meanings.sent5: Imagine osteocytes as the construction workers of our bone city, always working to keep it sturdy.

meanings.definition: A type of cell found in bone tissue that is responsible for bone formation and maintenance.
meanings.sent1: Our body relies on osteocytes to build and care for our bones.
meanings.sent2: Osteocytes are essential for the growth and upkeep of our skeletal system.
meanings.sent3: The osteocytes threw a party to celebrate another successful bone-building day.
meanings.sent4: In the bone orchestra, osteocytes are the conductors of growth and repair.
meanings.sent5: The osteocytes work tirelessly, like gardeners tending to the garden of our bones.
